subj-group.subject: TOPIC: PHENOMENOLOGY AND THE HUMAN SCIENCES
Studies in Phenomenology and the Human Sciences

title-group.article-title: The Common Presuppositions of Hermeneutics and Ethics: Types of Rationality Beyond Science and Technology
